entry.title: Elon Musk Predicts the End of All Jobs—Google AI Exec Disagrees
entry.summary: DeepMind co-founder Mustafa Suleyman rebutted Musk's predictions at the AI Safety Summit in the UK.

entry.title: Elon Musk Says xAI Chatbot Is ‘The Best that Currently Exists’ Ahead of Trial Launch
entry.summary: Elon Musk is opening up xAI to a select group of users as he challenges OpenAI and ChatGPT.

entry.title: This Week in Coins: Bitcoin Rally Cools and Solana Explodes
entry.summary: Bitcoin’s ETF hype-inspired rally may have run out of steam, but several leading altcoins still surged.

entry.title: Dogecoin Sweepstakes Case Heads to the Supreme Court
entry.summary: A Coinbase promotion tried to harness the popularity and whimsy of the memecoin, but participants say they missed the fine print.

entry.title: NFTs Are Back? Sales Jump 32% in October, Led by Ethereum
entry.summary: After months of falling sales, the NFT market grew substantially in October, per data from DappRadar—even if it's still far from the peak.

entry.title: Will Caroline Ellison and Sam Bankman-Fried’s Other Co-Defendants Go to Prison?
entry.summary: Despite delivering key testimony against their former boss, Caroline Ellison, Nishad Singh, and Gary Wang are each still facing decades behind bars.

entry.title: OpenSea Slashes NFT Marketplace Staff by 50%
entry.summary: NFT marketplace OpenSea, valued at $13.3 billion in 2022, confirmed Friday that it has laid off about half of its staff.

entry.title: Stablecoin Supply Has Bottomed Out—Is It Bullish for Crypto?
entry.summary: Investors are turning their cold hard cash into cold hard stablecoins. Next to rising prices, does this mark the beginning of a new bull?

entry.title: Amazon Is Giving Away Free Gaming NFTs—Here's How to Claim
entry.summary: UPDATE: Brawlers enters the ring with Amazon Prime Gaming, offering a free NFT fighter and other perks, while Mojo Melee launches a new NFT.

entry.title: FTX Is Handing Over Customer Crypto Trading Data to the FBI
entry.summary: Court records show that FTX bankruptcy advisers have given FBI offices information on customer accounts. What does that mean?

entry.title: Coinbase 'Ready to Hit the Ground Running' on Bitcoin ETF Approval, Says COO
entry.summary: Crypto analysts have speculated a spot Bitcoin ETF would be good for the asset's price, but Coinbase's COO underscored stability.

entry.title: What Is Solana? A Scalable, Decentralized Network for Dapps
entry.summary: Solana boasts impressive speeds and a burgeoning dapp ecosystem, but it's still on the proving grounds.

entry.title: Solana Drops 5% as FTX-Linked Address Moves SOL to Kraken, Binance
entry.summary: FTX-linked addresses have had a busy 24 hours, with several large Solana transfers headed for some of the industry's largest exchanges.

entry.title: What's Old Is New Again as Fortnite Goes 'OG' With Original Island
entry.summary: Fortnite gets an old-school overhaul with the new OG throwback season. Here’s what to expect from the popular shooter.

entry.title: Block Stock Soars as Cash App’s Bitcoin Revenue Hits $2.42 Billion
entry.summary: Jack Dorsey’s Block saw $5.62 billion in revenue for the third quarter, largely driven by its Bitcoin-related business.

entry.title: These Are the High-Profile Spot Bitcoin ETF Applications Currently in Play
entry.summary: Bitcoin exchange-traded funds have sprung up around the world—but the U.S. SEC has made slow progress towards approval of a Bitcoin spot ETF.

entry.title: Where Will Sam Bankman-Fried Be Sent to Prison? The Options Are Bleak
entry.summary: The freshly convicted crypto mogul is poised to spend the coming decades in a medium-security prison in California. That’s not great, to put it mildly.

entry.title: The Vladimir Putin Body Double Rumor Won't Die—And AI Makes It Seem Plausible
entry.summary: A Japanese news segment revived rumors about Vladimir Putin using AI-enhanced body doubles, raising concerns over the misuse of deepfake technology.

entry.title: Arnold Schwarzenegger Fakes AI Advice in Gym Stunt
entry.summary: Watch the former governor and action star dispense wisdom on fitness, success, and even marriage.

entry.title: Crypto Twitter Weighs In on Bankman-Fried Verdict
entry.summary: From "a clear warning for other operators in crypto" to "RIP BOZO," commentary flooded the timeline.

entry.title: Guilty: Sam Bankman-Fried Convicted of FTX Fraud
entry.summary: A jury found the former crypto mogul guilty of fraud, conspiracy, and money laundering charges in New York.

entry.title: NBA Star Victor Wembanyama NFT Just Broke His Trading Card Record—Here's How
entry.summary: San Antonio Spurs phenom Victor Wembanyama is putting up numbers—both on the court and in Sorare NBA. Here’s how much his NFT sold for.

entry.title: Michael Saylor: 'Unprecedented' Demand Is Set to 10X Bitcoin
entry.summary: MicroStrategy co-founder Michael Saylor believes the next year will be the biggest ever not just for Bitcoin, but for any financial offering.

entry.title: Coinbase Reports $2.2 Million Q3 Loss, Beats Wall Street Predictions Third Time This Year
entry.summary: The San Francisco-based firm has beat analysts’ profit and revenue expectations thrice this year.

entry.title: Beatles' Final Song ‘Now and Then’ Brought to Life by AI
entry.summary: The legendary rock group makes a historic comeback with John Lennon's archived and now isolated signature voice.

entry.title: Argentina Presidential Hopeful Wants to Mine Bitcoin From 'Dead Cow'
entry.summary: The Vaca Muerta (Dead Cow) oil field in Argentina could be a viable source of energy to mine Bitcoin, says a presidential hopeful.

entry.title: Post Malone Is Taking Over 'Apex Legends'
entry.summary: EA's free-to-play battle royale shooter Apex Legends is teaming up with musician Post Malone for a new game mode, cosmetic items, and more.

entry.title: After Bitcoin Tops $35K, Uniswap and Aave Lead DeFi Token Surge
entry.summary: Bitcoin was fast closing in on $36,000 per coin last night. But DeFi tokens are among the biggest gainers right now.

entry.title: 'Elemental Knights' Spinoff Leads New Games Coming to Immutable zkEVM
entry.summary: GensoKishi Online, Cursed Stone, and Sailwars are all coming to Immutable zkEVM, the upcoming gaming-centric Ethereum scaling network.

entry.title: Meet LEO AI, The Brave Browser Assistant from Anthropic
entry.summary: Leo can carry a conversation but filters out potentially dangerous requests and responses—with more features planned.

entry.title: So You Want to Short Ethereum? There's an ETF for That
entry.summary: ProShares’ latest Ethereum-focused fund may appeal to investors who are bearish on the market’s second-largest cryptocurrency.

entry.title: Not Just Solana: Gaming Tokens Are Booming as Decentraland's MANA Pumps
entry.summary: Solana is this week’s biggest gainer, but another token has topped the charts over the past day, with Decentraland’s MANA up 12%.

entry.title: SHIB Devs Launch Name Service in Decentralized Identity Push
entry.summary: The SHIB devs are still hard at work spinning up a hyped up decentralized identity platform, rolling out a new name service for users.

entry.title: MicroStrategy Buys More Bitcoin as Q3 Loss Widens
entry.summary: With the latest addition of Bitcoin to its balance sheet, MicroStrategy now holds approximately 0.75% of Bitcoin's circulating supply.

entry.title: SEC Served PayPal Subpoena 'Relating' to Firm's Stablecoin
entry.summary: PayPal also said in its quarterly report that it is cooperating with authorities in its request for documents "relating" to its stablecoin.

entry.title: Zoids Wild Arena Game Coming to Axie Infinity's Ronin Network
entry.summary: All of ACT Games’ portfolio will migrate to the Ronin network, beginning with the blockchain trading card game Zoids Wild Arena.

entry.title: Sophie Maxx on NFTs, Augmented Reality, and Fashion
entry.summary: This week our host is joined by Sophie Maxx (Web3Maxx) to discuss NFTs, augmented reality, the metaverse, how blockchain is sneaking into the fashion world, and more!

entry.title: 5 Questions With SCENE: Kevin Rose
entry.summary:
Kevin Rose, co-founder and CEO of PROOF and co-creator of the hit Moonbirds NFT collection, joins 5 Questions with SCENE to answer some hard-hitting questions about his childhood dreams, his wife’s candy preferences, and his undying love of rap music.
Video shot and edited by Vincent Roazzi Jr.

entry.title: What Happened to Atari's Token? Inside Atari's Blockchain Plans
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin chats with Atari X director Tyler Drewitz about what happened with Atari's token plans, whether a token is coming, and what Atari games might be getting the blockchain treatment. Oh, and there's lots of Easter eggs.

entry.title: Twitch CEO Dan Clancy Is a 'Wild Card,' Says Marketing Director
entry.summary: Twitch Senior Director of Community Marketing Mary Kish speaks with Decrypt's Kate Irwin about Twitch CEO Dan Clancy, Ninja, Twitch's new simulcasting rules, the biggest differences between Twitch and rival platform Kick, and the role of esports on the streaming platform.

entry.title: Why NFT Paris has Launched a Loyalty Token
entry.summary: NFT Paris founder Alexandre Tsydenkov told Decrypt what to expect from the upcoming 2024 edition of the conference, the launch of its loyalty token and its plans to create a Web3 loyalty program that rewards the most engaged members of the community.

entry.title: Game Review—Formula E: High Voltage Is a Fun Play-to-Earn Racer That Lacks Direction
entry.summary:
Formula E: High Voltage is a play-to-earn racing game with a distinctive strategic approach. Decrypt contributor Ryan Gladwin put Animoca's web-based game through its paces in this review, highlighting the unique gameplay design, the role of NFTs and crypto, and where the game currently comes up short.

entry.title: Amanda Cassatt on Web3 Marketing and the early days of Ethereum
entry.summary:
In this week's episode, our host is joined by Amanda Cassatt!
Amanda is the founder of Serotonin, a web3 marketing agency, the author of the first book ever published on web3 marketing, and led the marketing team that helped bring Ethereum to market.

entry.title: Midnight Society's Rob Bowling on Deadrop's New Cars and User-Generated Modes
entry.summary: Decrypt reporter and GG producer Kate Irwin interviews Midnight Society Studio Head Rob Bowling about Deadrop's development and Snapshot VII.

entry.title: Game Review: 'Raini: The Lords of Light' Brands Itself With Memes
entry.summary: Raini: Lords of Light is an NFT-optional card game bursting with crypto memes. From SBF to CZ and Elon, this free-to-play game has some truly wild animations. Decrypt contributor Ryan S. Gladwin shares his honest thoughts on the game.

entry.title: Art Blocks Marfa Weekend Recap
entry.summary: Relive the Art Blocks Marfa Weekend 2023 event with this highlights video, produced by Vincent Roazzi Jr. for Decrypt Studios in partnership with Art Blocks.

entry.title: Phantom Galaxies: A Look Inside the Mech Shooter NFT Game
entry.summary: Animoca Brands and game studio Blowfish are developing Phantom Galaxies, an upcoming sci-fi mech shooter game inspired by mech battlers like Transformers. Decrypt's Kate Irwin asks Blowfish Studios Cofounder and Managing Director Ben Lee about what it's like to play the game.

entry.title: Clip: DeepMedia's DeepID Deepfake Detection Tool at Work
entry.summary: A clip showcasing how DeepMedia's DeepID deepfake detection tool works. Courtesy: DeepMedia

entry.title: Decentraland AI World Fair Trailer
entry.summary: A trailer for the AI World Fair event in metaverse game Decentraland, taking place from October 25-27. Courtesy: Decentraland.

entry.title: BackTheBunny - Money, Conspiracy, Milady
entry.summary:
Our host Reza Jafery sits down with BackTheBunny to dive deep into money, the fight against crypto that we're witnessing in real-time, and milady culture.
Our Host: https://twitter.com/rezajafery Our Guest: https://twitter.com/BackTheBunny

entry.title: 'A Grand Experiment': Shrapnel Studio Head Don Norbury Talks Game Economics
entry.summary: How much of Shrapnel's in-game items are tradeable NFTs? Don Norbury, Studio Head at Shrapnel and CTO at game studio NEON, tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about Shrapnel's approach to game economics, including different game pricing models and how NFT game economies create different challenges for developers.

entry.title: Trezor Safe 3 and Trezor Keep Metal Unboxing
entry.summary: Trezor has launched the Safe 3, a hardware wallet aimed at "new entrants to crypto," alongside the new Keep Metal recovery seed storage device. We take a first look at what comes in the box.

entry.title: Why AI Arena is Building on Arbitrum
entry.summary: AI Arena CEO Brandon Da Silva and COO Wei Xie discuss the challenges that come with building on Ethereum, ETH sidechains, and layer-two blockchains.

entry.title: Pet3rPan_ on venture DAOs and blockchain games
entry.summary:
Welcome to the 4th episode of this time will be different.
Our guest for today's episode is Pet3rpan_ from Metacartel, 1kx, HydraVentures, and more!
https://twitter.com/pet3rpan_
This Time Will Be Different is sponsored by 1000x https://decrypt.co/1000x

entry.title: Inside Shrapnel's Marketplace, New Map, and 'AI Director' Feature
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin chats with Shrapnel's Head of Studio Don Norbury to get the latest updates on how the NFT-powered first-person sci-fi extraction shooter's development is progressing.

entry.title: 'Art of the Times': Art Blocks Founder Erick Calderon on the State of Generative Art
entry.summary: Art Blocks founder and CEO Erick Calderon sat down with Sander Lutz, lead culture reporter at Decrypt's SCENE, at Art Blocks Marfa Weekend 2023. They discuss the evolution of the company and the generative art world, along with what draws art enthusiasts to be an active part of the community.
